messages.message:
previously (~ 1-2 months ago), we were able to search traces by id on aihub.instabase.com/grafana (http://aihub.instabase.com/grafana) though - do you know what would have changed recently?

also, it seems that we do call `trace_after_request` in each webserver, though?

> Confirmed the hypothesis by printing the active span right before we create a new one and we do have an active span as this should print None. this leads to the problem with same trace ID and missing trace ID error we were seeing earlier. (edited)
@puneet this is really good insight can we identify which span is open, and where this might be instrumented from?
